products.title: Splash Classic Blue Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. The colour of 2020, opt for classic blue to instill a calming tone within your space. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Classic White
products.description: Min width: 180mm max width: 1300mm min drop: 140mm max drop: 2000mm slat composition: aluminium slat widths available: 25mm guarantee: 12 months controls: tensioned (lift bottom bar to raise/lower blind, wand to tilt slats). Buy made to measure classic white perfect fit venetian blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality perfect fit venetian blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery.
